Package com.telenav.kivakit.resource.packages

Class Classpath

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.resource.packages.Classpath
public class Classpath extends Object
A model of the classpath. The model is presently exposes only the non-class resources on the classpath, as found by classgraph.

Resource Folders

  • allResourceFolders(Listener) - All resource folders on the classpath

Resources

  • allResources(Listener) - All resources on the classpath
  • resourcesIn(Listener, PackageReference) - All resources in the given package
  • nestedResources(Listener, PackageReference) - All resources under the given package
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
